name: Marketing Master（营销大师）
description:
This game was a gamejam work in 2021. Recently it got reorgnized in code and perfomance, hopefully will be more playable. And further updates are in plan.

In this game, two players play as two hostile shop owner. By playing cards per round, they can improve stats of their shops, so as to gain more profit than their rival. 1P uses ASD in keybaord to choose a card, and 2P uses ←↓→ in keyboard to choose a card.

这款游戏本来是 21 年的 gamejam 作品，最近重新整理的代码和表现，希望能提升一些可玩性，并计划在未来继续更新。

在游戏中两名玩家扮演两位敌对的便利店店主，每回合使用卡牌提升自己的商店属性，以获得比对手更高的利润。1P 使用 ASD 键选择卡牌，2P 使用 ←↓→键选择卡牌。

Source Code: https://github.com/wcz1016/MarketingMaster
